short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes spoilers from NBA.com League Pass pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NBA.com recently introduced a spoiler heading and image on the Games pages that is shown despite "Hide Scores" being toggled on. This extension replaces that heading with "Spoiler removed" and sets the opacity of the image to 0%. A short flicker might appear with the original content.
